summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 GENIE TZ50 TOWABLE LIFT. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING 65 MPH, THE ALUMINUM OUTRIGGER FELL OFF DURING TRANSPORT DUE TO THE DISINTEGRATION OF A RUBBER WASHER. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED AND AGREED TO REPLACE THE WASHER THAT WAS DAMAGED,  BUT WOULD NOT SUPPLY A KIT TO PREVENT THE OTHER THREE FROM HAVING THE SAME SAFETY ISSUE.  UPDATED 07/10/12*LJ
